title: Welcome To The 『Outcast’S Guild』~The Incompetent S-Rank Parties Keep Expelling Competent Party Members
description:
Description :
        High-rank parties chasing out their own party members because of their low stats has recently become a common trend. A young man named Aizen, feeling dissatisfied about the current status supremacism, has decided to gather the outcats who were expelled due their low stats, and establish his own guild together with them. 「Are you kicking them out of your party? I'm going to recruit them then!」 A person's abilities isn't limited to their stats alone The "weak" will bloom and become "strong" using of their latent abilites, their "hidden skill"! This is the start of an outcast revolution fantasy story!!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.2 Chapter 7: The New Outcast Member
